SEARCH
Package game.actors

Class Player

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
public class Player extends Actor
Class representing the Player character. The Player class is responsible for managing the player's stats (mana, hit points, strength), and determining what actions the player can take during their turn. Created by:
Author:
Adrian Kristanto

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, int mana, int strength)
      Constructor to initialize the Player.
      Parameters:
      name - Name to call the player in the UI.
      displayChar - Character to represent the player in the UI.
      hitPoints - Player's starting number of hit points.
      mana - Player's starting mana points.
      strength - Player's initial strength.

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Handles the player's actions during their turn. If the player is in the middle of a multi-turn action, it will continue that action. Otherwise, it displays the available actions in a menu.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - the list of possible actions for the player.
      lastAction - the action the player performed last turn.
      map - the current game map.
      display - the display used to show the game status.
      Returns:
      the action that the player chooses to perform.
